function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited studies on the post-occupancy evaluation poe of health club facilities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in evaluating and proposing effective pandemic precautionary measures for health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic prevention measures in sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate facility management and operational practices for pandemic prevention","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of covid-19 precautionary measures from a global perspective.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Systematically conducting an indicative walkthrough of a case study health club facility in saudi arabia.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identifying recommendations for improving operation of the case study facility.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation and unsatisfactory temperature control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of fungi and accumulation of dust","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ergonomics and utilization of space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of application of research in health club facilities may lead to ineffective disease prevention and mitigation strategies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid expansion of new health clubs without thorough planning may lead to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation measures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusive design for a diversified range of activities can lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and preventing disease transmission across different areas of the health club facilities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on pandemic risks in health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on cleanliness and maintenance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for accessibility and safety for physically challenged individuals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Voluntary implementation of sports facility policies","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systematic procedure for developing precautionary measures for covid-19 in sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of utilization of post-occupancy evaluation poe for proposed sports club designs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Neglect in implementing healthy and safety practices at sports facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for covid-19 precautionary requirements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance, hygiene risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prohibition of co-location of more than four people in fitness centers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complete shutdown
